grammar_name: 形容词比较级-基础用法
description: 学习形容词比较级的基础用法：比较两个事物的性质、程度

explanation.basic_structure: A + be + 形容词比较级 + than + B
basic_rules: 比较级用来比较两个事物的性质、程度
比较级 + than 表示"比...更..."
单音节和部分双音节形容词用-er
usage_cases: 比较身高：Tom is taller than Jack.
比较年龄：Mary is older than Lucy.
比较大小：This book is bigger than that one.
比较价格：This car is more expensive than that one.
common_errors: Tom is more tall than Jack. (错误) → Tom is taller than Jack. (正确)
This book is more big than that one. (错误) → This book is bigger than that one. (正确)
He is more good than me. (错误) → He is better than me. (正确)
usage_tips: 单音节和部分双音节形容词用-er
注意不规则形容词的变化

sentences: This book is more interesting than that one.
He is better than me at English.
This car is more expensive than that one.
She is happier than her sister.

templates.question: This book is _____ than that one.
This car is _____ than that one.
He is _____ than me at English.

templates.sentence: Tom is more tall than Jack.
He is more good than me.

learning_objectives: 掌握形容词比较级的基本用法

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用比较级，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握比较级用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解比较级基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对比较级用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
